title: Did Dolly Barton say that "Dixie " was" tempting "?
subtitle: "Jolene" spoke of the word in the midst of renewed talks about the abolition of culture.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Singer Dolly Barton said about using the word "dexie" in "dixie stumped" as a supper attraction: "When you realize that [something] is a problem, you have to fix it. "Don't be an idiot."
